theorem _root_.affine_map.is_open_map {P Q : Type _} [MetricSpace P] [NormedAddTorsor E P] [MetricSpace Q]
    [NormedAddTorsor F Q] (f : Â«expr â†’áµƒ[ ] Â» P ğ•œ Q) (hf : Continuous f) (surj : surjective f) : IsOpenMap f :=
  affine_map.is_open_map_linear_iff.mp <|

      (f.linear_surjective_iff.mpr surj)

    Â· rw [iterate_succ']

protected theorem QuotientMap (surj : surjective f) : QuotientMap f :=
